sizeInfo: The frame will make your photograph stand out. It contains a chalk-white mat that creates a visually lightened space between the frame and the photo. Therefore, the frame is always one size larger than your photo print.
deliveryInfoMain: The order is usually ready for pickup within 14 days of processing.
deliveryPost: from 79 CZK (price is based on the shipment size)
paymentInfoMain: The order can be paid in cash upon pickup or by cashless QR payment
